item.title: Trump tweets, White House staff disruptions trigger 2017 déjà vu
item.description: GOP lawmakers are battling the same distractions as in Trump’s first term despite talk of stability in the West Wing.

item.title: The lasting impact of Trump’s federal surge on one D.C. neighborhood
item.description: Those at the 10th Place apartments in Southeast Washington said the president’s crime strategy deepened their distrust of police and made them feel no...

item.title: Trump set to explore expanding CBD access for seniors
item.description: An administration pilot program to offer Medicare reimbursement for CBD treatments for seniors with cancer is expected as soon as next year.

item.title: Trump officials ordered to lift limits on lawmakers’ visits to ICE facilities
item.description: A recent requirement that members of Congress give seven days’ notice before visiting ICE immigration detention centers is unlawful, a judge ruled.
